title: How to Delete a Message in Discord on Android

steps.title: Open Discord.
steps.content: Open Discord. It’s the purple or blue icon with a white gamepad illustration. You’ll find it on your home screen or in the app drawer.

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . It’s at the top-left corner of the screen.

steps.title: Select a friend under “Direct Messages.”
steps.content: Select a friend under “Direct Messages.” This section is where you’ll find all of your Direct Message conversations with friends.

steps.title: Tap and hold the message you want to delete.
steps.content: Tap and hold the message you want to delete. A pop-up menu will appear.

steps.title: Tap Delete.
steps.content: Tap Delete . This removes the message from the conversation.

steps.title: Open Discord.
steps.content: Open Discord. It’s the purple or blue icon with a white gamepad illustration. You’ll find it on your home screen or in the app drawer.

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . It’s at the top-left corner of the screen.

steps.title: Select a server.
steps.content: Select a server. This server should be the one that hosts the chat channel from which you want to delete a message.

steps.title: Tap ⁝.
steps.content: Tap ⁝ . It’s at the top-right corner of the screen. A pop-up will appear.

steps.title: Type your own username and tap the magnifying glass.
steps.content: Type your own username and tap the magnifying glass. This searches the channel for messages you’ve sent.

steps.title: Tap the message you want to delete.
steps.content: Tap the message you want to delete. It will now open in a window called “Preview Chat.”

steps.title: Tap Jump to Chat.
steps.content: Tap Jump to Chat . It’s at the bottom of the screen.

steps.title: Scroll up to the message you want to delete.
steps.content: Scroll up to the message you want to delete.

steps.title: Tap and hold the message.
steps.content: Tap and hold the message. A pop-up will appear.

steps.title: Tap Delete.
steps.content: Tap Delete . This message will now be removed from the channel.
